Posts.Content: Thank you Jim and Rudy ! Your replys were helpful. I wish you both a speedy recovery.
Posts.Title: Surgery Scheduled-

Posts.Content: I would like some opinions. Husband has chosen Davinci Rad Prostatectomy. I agree with this, but keep reading news articles about overtesting and over treatment. I am concerned he could be making a mistake. His stats are : Age 48, Gleason 6, 5 cores positive with 3 cores at 80%. psa 4. Any thoughts on his opitions ?
